Name: Jolly LLB
Description: Jolly, a struggling lawyer seeking success, comes upon a hit-and-run case and decides to fight for the victims. However, the defendant hires a proficient lawyer, Rajpal, to go against him.

Name: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
Description: An NRI and his wife decide to stay in his ancestral home, paying no heed to the warnings about ghosts. Soon, inexplicable occurrences cause him to call a psychiatrist to help solve the mystery.

Name: K.G.F: Chapter 1
Description: Rocky, a young man, seeks power and wealth in order to fulfil a promise to his dying mother. His quest takes him to Mumbai, where he gets involved with the notorious gold mafia.

Name: 3 Idiots
Description: In college, Farhan and Raju form a great bond with Rancho due to his refreshing outlook. Years later, a bet gives them a chance to look for their long-lost friend whose existence seems rather elusive.

Name: Ratsasan
Description: Arun gives up on his dream of becoming a filmmaker and takes up the job of a police officer after his father's death. He then attempts to track down a psychotic killer who targets schoolgirls.

Name: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
Description: M S Dhoni, a boy from Ranchi, aspires to play cricket for India. Though he initially tries to please his father by working for the Indian Railways, he ultimately decides to chase his dreams.

Name: Vikram
Description: A special agent investigates a murder committed by a masked group of serial killers. However, a tangled maze of clues soon leads him to the drug kingpin of Chennai.

Name: Mersal
Description: Maaran, a doctor, is falsely arrested for the murder of his colleague, Dr Arjun Zachariah. He soon discovers that the real culprit is a lookalike who aims to expose corruption in the medical industry.

Name: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
Description: Pawan, a devotee of Lord Hanuman, finds a girl, who is speech impaired, lost in Haryana. He soon learns that she belongs to Pakistan and sets out to reunite her with her family at great personal cost.

Name: Super 30
Description: Anand Kumar, a mathematician from Patna, India, works his way through challenges towards success before running the Super 30 programme for IIT aspirants in Patna.

Name: Sultan
Description: After the death of his son, Sultan Ali Khan, a middle-aged wrestler, gives up the sport. Years later, he sets out to revive his career as he needs the prize money and wants to regain his lost respect.

Name: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
Description: Surinder, a simple man, falls for a vivacious Tani and gets married to her. In order to impress her, he undergoes a complete makeover and becomes Raj.

Name: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
Description: Munna Bhai, a gangster, decides to fulfil his father's dream by becoming a doctor. With a little help from his loyal sidekick Circuit, he enrols in a medical college and gets to work.

Name: Raid
Description: After receiving an anonymous tip, Amay Patnaik, a senior income tax officer, begins an investigation on an influential man in Lucknow for money laundering.

Name: Stree
Description: The people of Chanderi live under constant fear of Stree, the spirit of a woman who attacks men at night during festivals. Vicky, along with his friends, decides to unravel the mystery.

Name: 12th Fail
Description: IPS officer Manoj Kumar Sharma fearlessly embraces the idea of restarting his academic journey and reclaiming his destiny at a place where millions of students attempt the world's toughest competitive exam: UPSC.

Name: Taare Zameen Par
Description: Ishaan is criticised by his parents for his poor academic performance and is sent away to a boarding school. Ram, an art teacher, however, realises he has dyslexia and helps him uncover his potential.

Name: PK
Description: An innocent alien lands on Earth but loses his communication device. He meets Jaggu, a heartbroken reporter, and tries to find his device. With time, he raises many thought-provoking questions.

Name: Major
Description: Major Sandeep Unnikrishnan faces his biggest battle when he joins the task force to save the occupants at the Taj Hotel attacked by a terrorist group.

Name: Evaru
Description: Vikram, a police inspector, is tasked with catching the killer of a senior officer who has allegedly raped Sameera. When he starts investigating, he encounters dark secrets tied to his past.

Name: Goodachari
Description: Gopi is recruited into RAW, but on his graduation day, he is implicated in a plot to kill two RAW officials. Declared a wanted terrorist, Gopi fights to clear his name and find the people responsible.

Name: HIT
Description: A police officer in the homicide intervention team must overcome his struggles with his tragic past in order to investigate a case involving a missing woman.

Name: HIT: The Second Case
Description: Krishna Dev, a nonchalant police officer, investigates a gruesome murder case and as the case unfolds, the level of danger rises.

Name: Kaithi
Description: Dilli, an ex-convict, endeavours to meet his daughter for the first time after leaving prison. However, his attempts are interrupted due to a drug raid planned by Inspector Bejoy.

Name: Leo
Description: Parthiban, a cafe owner, lives with his wife and son in Himachal Pradesh. Things take an absurd turn for him when he gets in the way of a drug cartel.

Name: Taandob
Description: A television channel is attacked by terrorists. A powerful and mysterious figure, Mikhail, is linked to the conspiracy behind the attack. Saira, a retired journalist, assists in investigating the incident.

Name: Borbaad
Description: After a heartbreak by Nitu, Ariyan Mizra seeks revenge, guided by his father Adib's wisdom. Their story transforms from romance to violence, culminating in courtroom confrontations over justice.

Name: Toofan
Description: Shanto, an aspiring actor, is forced to be a body-double for Toofan, a mafia kingpin. Unexpected twists, turns and chaos follow.

Name: Drishyam
Description: When the disappearance of a policewoman's son threatens to ruin Vijay's family, he leaves no stone unturned in order to shield his family.

Name: Drishyam 2
Description: Seven years after facing traumatic events, the Salgaonkars have moved on with life. However, unforeseen circumstances threaten to bring dark truths to light.

Name: Badlapur
Description: Raghu loses his wife and son when two bank robbers steal their car in a bid to run. Devastated by the incident, Raghu decides to take revenge on the culprits, Liak and Harman, for killing his family.

Name: Ghajini
Description: Hit by an iron rod, Sanjay suffers from a condition that prevents him from remembering anything beyond fifteen minutes. With notes tattooed on his body, he sets out to find his fiancee's killer.

Name: Thuppakki
Description: An army officer sets out to save the people of his country when he learns that an entire network of terrorists are operating in the city and are planning to carry out multiple terror attacks.

Name: Rocketry: The Nambi Effect
Description: The life of Nambi Narayanan is full of struggles and accomplishments as an aerospace engineer. However, he faces his biggest challenge while working at ISRO when the world accuses him of treason.
